title: Star Wars: VISIONS Explained: Every Easter Egg and Reference You Missed in The New Trailer
author: ScreenCrush
comment: I’m glad this is not canon, because now these studios can have free reign on making beautiful and amazing stories!

force sensitive droids

Greivous: This is outrageous, it's unfair
I think it would be pretty interesting idea if these star war vision episodes could be old folk tales within the starwars universe, kind of a fiction within fiction would be interesting
the fact that Lucasfilms basically told these studios “go crazy” and then we get this trailer has me really excited for the 22nd.
description:
Star Wars Visions is the new anime series on Disney Plus that gives some of the top anime studios carte blanche to reinterpret the Star Wars universe. In this video we break down all 9 short films, the new footage, and explain their connections to the greater star wars canon.

If you're new, Subscribe! →
